name: Lightcube
description:
A neon-space-themed infinite runner with special player-affecting obstacles.

Description

Try to unlock all the cubes and get your highscore in this neon-space-themed endless runner! Play a randomly generated level everytime you restart and enjoy the several special player-affecting obstacles.

Features
  • endless levels
  • local highscore-board
  • unlockable cubes
  • player-affecting obstacles
  • play with keyboard or controller
  • 3D and 2D mode
